_id.desc: Unique identifier for the hive object

is_virtual.desc: Whether or not field value is stored or calculated dynamically by the system; attempts to change the value may be a no-op or may have special side effects (true = stored, false = calculated dynamically

is_prefetch.desc: If true, system will prefetch the type definition on startup

is_user.desc: If true, objects of this type will be shown in the main HIVE explorer UI

is_system.desc: If true, non-admin users are not allowed to create objects of this type

singleton.desc: Optional integer, possible values: 0, 1, 2; 0 by default. If non-zero, an object of this type must be unique per user or per system

_parents.desc: List of names of the hive object's parent types

_includes.desc: List of names of the includes (mixins) used by the hive object

_children.desc: List of names of the hive object's child types for which the object is a parent

_attributes.desc: Object whose values (guaranteed to be unique) are field descriptions
